welcome.title: Time Worth

compoundInterest.title: Compound Interest ({{rate}}%)
compoundInterest.infoMessage:
Compound interest means earning interest not just on your savings, but also on the interest already accumulated.

Example: If you save ‚Ç¨1,000 at 7% per year:
‚Ä¢ After 10 years ‚Üí ~‚Ç¨1,967
‚Ä¢ After 20 years ‚Üí ~‚Ç¨3,870

The longer you save, the more powerful the effect!
compoundInterest.subtitle: Adjust the interest rate to match your investment returns
compoundInterest.customRateHint: Enter a custom annual return rate (0-100%)
compoundInterest.invalidRateMessage: Please enter a rate between 0 and 100
